headerAltText.invent: Visual overview of the redesigned corporate identity and diverse print materials created for INVENT.
headerAltText.republic: Atmospheric interior shot highlighting lighting, furnishings, and spatial mood.

contact.title: Get in Touch!
contact.message: Whether fresh ideas, exciting projects, or new collaborations – I'm always open to creative challenges.

home.headerSubtitle: Frontend, UI/UX, Print & Marketing – Thoughtful designs that inspire
home.subtitle: Frontend Developer & UI/UX Designer

projects.headerSubtitle: With expertise in design, development, and branding – tailored for every need.
projects.headerFreeSubtitle: With heart and passion – creative experiments that inspire.

redlinkGPT.title: RedlinkGPT
redlinkGPT.subtitle: Intelligent AI Toolbox for Internal Company Data
redlinkGPT.description: RedlinkGPT is an innovative product by Redlink GmbH that supports companies in optimizing their workflows and revolutionizing the use of internal data with conversational AI. The focus during development was on concept creation, UI/UX design, and the creation of promotional materials.
redlinkGPT.uspDesc: RedlinkGPT is a modular, conversational AI toolbox based on RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) that helps companies streamline their processes and increase productivity. With native Microsoft Teams integration, the solution enables precise analysis and search of internal data and can be flexibly integrated into existing systems.

moreStudyManager.title: MORE
moreStudyManager.subtitle: Multimodal Research Environment
moreStudyManager.description: The MORE platform offers a digital infrastructure for collecting and analyzing multimodal data and promotes interdisciplinary collaboration in digital health and sustainable research projects. It enables the collection and analysis of data from various sources. The technical implementation includes a web app for study managers to manage and evaluate data, and a mobile app for participants to easily collect data.

redlinkat.title: Redlink GmbH
redlinkat.subtitle: Redesign and Management of the Corporate Identity
redlinkat.description: As part of the redesign of Redlink GmbH, the website, business documents, various print materials, and merchandise were developed to modernize the company’s presence and create a consistent brand identity.

redlinkatWhitepaper.title: Redlink Whitepaper
redlinkatWhitepaper.subtitle: Whitepapers on Search UX and LLM
redlinkatWhitepaper.description: Creation of two whitepapers as part of Redlink’s focus areas: “Good Search UX” and “Find Things Smarter: On the Use of Large Language Models in Enterprise Content Retrieval.” The whitepapers offer insights into UX component development for efficient search, and how AI technologies can increase the efficiency of information retrieval in companies.
redlinkatWhitepaper.goodSearchUX: In the digital age, we’re drowning in a flood of data and information. That’s where search applications come in. Many enterprises wish for something simple, 'like Google' — but with their own data and just one search box. It sounds easy, but there are many nuances. In reality, people need more than a search box. They need multiple ways to interact with search. Our whitepaper summarizes what we’ve learned over the past decade.
redlinkatWhitepaper.llmTitle: Find Things Smarter: On the Use of Large Language Models in Enterprise Content Retrieval
redlinkatWhitepaper.llm: Large Language Models (LLMs) play an important role in unlocking information within enterprises — both internally and for their customers. Our whitepaper 'Finding Things Smarter' shows how modern technologies such as Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) can be effectively used in companies to generate relevant, contextual answers. The topic was developed in collaboration with the IDA Lab.

dachsteinTicketshop.title: Dachstein Ticketshop
dachsteinTicketshop.subtitle: Online Ticket Shop for the Dachstein Ski Area
dachsteinTicketshop.description: The Dachstein Ticketshop allows visitors to conveniently book their tickets online for the Dachstein Glacier. The platform offers a user-friendly interface, various ticket options, and secure payment. The goal of the project was to implement a modern online ticket shop as part of the relaunch, providing an intuitive user experience to make ticket purchasing as easy and comfortable as possible.

plantbase.title: PlantBase
plantbase.subtitle: Plant Care Management System
plantbase.description: PlantBase is a comprehensive web application that helps users manage and care for their indoor plants. It offers detailed care instructions, watering schedules, and growth tracking features. Additionally, it includes integrated user management and forums to support optimal plant care and enable users to share experiences within the community.

gameShop.title: Game Shop
gameShop.subtitle: A Modern E-Commerce Design for a Game E-Shop
gameShop.description: The Game Shop UI/UX project focuses on creating an appealing, user-friendly design for a digital game store. With a clear information structure, easy navigation, and aesthetic design, the shop provides a smooth shopping experience for gamers. The goal was to develop a modern e-commerce platform that meets the needs of the gaming community and offers an optimal user experience.

steuerkanzleiKaufmann.title: Kaufmann Ticketshop
steuerkanzleiKaufmann.subtitle: Modern Website Redesign
steuerkanzleiKaufmann.description: A modern and professional website was developed for the Kaufmann Tax Office, offering a clear, user-friendly platform. The aim was to inform clients about the services offered and to simplify the contact process. The website was completely redesigned to ensure a contemporary digital presence, with a focus on intuitive navigation and well-structured content.

invent.title: INVENT Urlaubsbox
invent.subtitle: Holiday Packages for Companies and Individuals
invent.description: In the internal graphics department at INVENT, holiday boxes were created for companies and individuals, accompanied by a redesign of the corporate design. Additionally, customized promotional materials and offers, as well as e-commerce assets, were created to optimize product marketing.

roco.title: Roco & Fleischmann
roco.subtitle: A Paradise for Model Train Enthusiasts
roco.description: For Roco and Fleischmann, a leading manufacturer of model trains, high-quality print materials were created, including product catalogs, flyers, advertisements, and packaging designs. These materials present the Roco product range in a visually appealing way. The focus was on accurately depicting the models and maintaining consistent brand-compliant design.

wiberg.title: Wiberg GmbH
wiberg.subtitle: Flavorful Spice Worlds
wiberg.description: For Wiberg, a renowned manufacturer of spices and gourmet products, appealing print materials were created. These included product catalogs, packaging designs for spices, and recipe brochures that visually emphasize the quality and variety of Wiberg products.

inspiranto.title: Inspiranto GmbH
inspiranto.subtitle: Creative Concepts for Effective Brand Communication
inspiranto.description: For Inspiranto GmbH, an advertising agency specializing in strategy, creation, and marketing services, the visual design of high-quality promotional materials and illustrations was developed. The focus was on creating creative designs that effectively support clients' brand messaging.

hajimaru.title: Hajimaru
hajimaru.subtitle: Manga Café Concept Design
hajimaru.description: A creative space was developed for the concept design of the Hajimaru Manga Café in Vienna, specifically tailored to the manga and anime community. The design focuses on interactive experiences that immerse visitors in the world of 'stories' — whether through manga reading, themed decorations and exhibitions, or events such as workshops and discussions. The goal is to create a meeting place where fans can share their passion for manga and anime.

tube.title: Tube Club
tube.subtitle: Concept Design for an Artist Club
tube.description: An innovative space was developed for the concept design of the artist club 'Tube', which brings together creative minds and artists. The club combines digital art, analog stage performance, and exceptional spatial design to create a unique experience. The design fosters an open, inspiring atmosphere where people from different creative fields can express themselves freely.
tube.philosophyDesc: Tube is a club in Vienna that offers space for creative minds and communication. It does not distinguish between personalities or social classes — everyone who feels comfortable is welcome.
tube.uspDesc: Tube transports its visitors into another world by combining digital technologies with analog stage art and spatial design. It creates space for extraordinary performances, unique digital worlds, and overwhelming experiences across all areas offered by Tube, developed and led by specially trained and professional staff.
tube.targetGroupDesc: The target group includes all creative individuals and people who enjoy expressing themselves creatively or living creatively in their own way. As a result, social, cultural, or age differences do not limit the audience.

landespreis2014.title: Landespreis 2014
landespreis2014.subtitle: Discover Perspectives
landespreis2014.description: The concept 'Discover Perspectives' was developed for the 'State Prize 2014' competition. The goal was to challenge people’s usual perception and break their tunnel vision. The concept aimed to promote a new way of seeing, encouraging people to look beyond their past experiences and discover new perspectives.

untersbergbahn.title: Untersbergbahn
untersbergbahn.subtitle: Redesign of the Salzburg Untersberg Cable Car
untersbergbahn.description: As part of a competition at the WDA, a redesign and campaign concept was developed for the Salzburg Untersberg Cable Car. The concept focused on the 'timeless moments' of the mountain that make each visit unforgettable. The visual implementation was inspired by nature and featured seasonal design elements for both winter and summer.

heratBeat.title: Café Heart.Beat
heratBeat.subtitle: Concept Design for a Bio Café
heratBeat.description: The concept design for Café Heart.Beat was created to offer a place for relaxation and connection. It is aimed at people seeking an escape from their stressful everyday lives to live more in the moment. Guests are encouraged to enjoy the present, engage with others, and experience a stress-free environment. The design promotes a welcoming, peaceful atmosphere that invites people to linger and engage in conversation.
heratBeat.philosophyDesc: The café welcomes anyone looking for a place to unwind and step away from everyday stress. Here, they can enjoy time for themselves and be present in the moment without being affected by external negativity. They can live freely in the now, exchanging thoughts with others and letting conversations flow.
heratBeat.targetGroupDesc: The target group includes everyone looking to escape daily stress and freely experience the moment without external pressure — people who enjoy sharing their experiences with others. The core age range is 18 and older.
heratBeat.serviceDesc: The café generates its main revenue by charging for time spent there. The primary offerings are drinks — tea, coffee, juices, non-alcoholic beverages — along with light snacks for small cravings. The menu includes 'specials' that cater to larger or more specific requests, such as full meals or freshly squeezed juices, which are offered at a small additional cost that’s lower than in typical cafés.

cruiseMissilesRoyality.title: Cruise Missiles Royality
cruiseMissilesRoyality.subtitle: Promo CD
cruiseMissilesRoyality.description: The design of the promo CD was developed based on the band’s musical character, aiming to make a strong visual impression even before listening. The booklet’s colors and shapes symbolize a powerful yet transient personality that reflects the music’s tone. The CD, shaped like a foldable star pyramid, emphasizes the band’s potential to become a 'star in the music sky' and evokes the emotional connection formed through music. The wooden case represents the stage where emotions are exchanged between the band and its fans.

makro.title: Macro
makro.subtitle: Photo Series
makro.description: This macro photo series reveals the often-overlooked details of nature. By focusing on microscopic structures and vivid colors, it captures the stunning beauty of the natural world from unique perspectives.

hausMaschine.title: House-Machine
hausMaschine.subtitle: Photo Series
hausMaschine.description: This photo project explores the fusion of human and technology within a house that becomes a machine. Inspired by 'Ghost in the Shell', it highlights dependency on digital networks. Cables, lighting installations, and cold tones intensify the dystopian atmosphere, illustrating the technological omnipresence.

3dPlayground.title: 3D Playground
3dPlayground.description: In the '3D Playground', the digital world comes alive with creative forms and structures. Fascinating 3D objects, characters, and landscapes emerge — a space where imagination takes shape and digital creations become immersive experiences.

soundDesignSnippets.title: Sound Design Snippets
soundDesignSnippets.description: This project creates soundscapes from what usually goes unnoticed. With precise finesse, everyday sounds are transformed into captivating audio environments. Using Foley techniques, real-world noises are creatively recreated to enrich film, music, and other media with authentic, emotional sound.

iris.title: Iris
iris.description: Iris explores life with visual impairment and poses the questions: 'How does a visually impaired person experience everyday life?' and 'How can this be made tangible for sighted individuals to raise awareness?' These questions shape the concept and design of the game.
iris.settingDesc: Iris, a 35-year-old journalist, lost her sight due to an optic nerve disease (including Charles Bonnet syndrome). She can now only perceive blurry shapes, light, and shadow — without color. As a result of her condition, she shifted from being an illustrator to working as a journalist from home. Iris lives in her childhood home and faces the daily challenges of independent living.

illu.title: Illustration
illu.description: Illustration is much more than just drawing — it brings ideas to life, tells stories without words, and creates entire new worlds on paper or screen. Whether playful or detailed, every illustration has its own personality.

dummyMagazin.title: Dummy Magazine
dummyMagazin.description: The design of the Dummy Magazine revolves around the theme of rhythm — from clearly structured editorial layouts to deliberate deconstruction of typesetting and layout that challenge and redefine visual tempo.

capoeira.title: Capoeira
capoeira.subtitle: Photo Series
capoeira.description: Dynamism, elegance, and power — this photo series captures the flowing movements and acrobatic elements of Capoeira. Powerful images are created in the studio that bring rhythm, body control, and the tradition of this unique martial art to life.

microfobius.title: Microfobius
microfobius.description: Microfobius is a fictional totalitarian state in a dystopian future, where technology no longer serves individuals but a small elite that rules the country. Society is increasingly pushed into a technical age, while nature is suppressed and the environment destroyed. The population lives in a mass society working for technological progress without benefiting from it. Infographics were created for this fictional state to illustrate the population’s living conditions.

nevilleBrody.title: Neville Brody Design
nevilleBrody.description: For the Neville Brody design project, posters and magazine pages were created inspired by Brody’s distinctive, experimental style. With a focus on typographic innovation and expressive visuals, the design elements reflect Brody’s influence on modern graphic design.

vectorIllu.title: Vector Illustration
vectorIllu.description: Vector illustrations are precise and scalable graphics characterized by clean lines and detailed representations. Perfect for logos, icons, and sharp illustrations and designs, they remain crisp at any size and offer great flexibility in use.

republic.title: Interior Photography
republic.description: Interior photography captures the atmosphere of a space by focusing on lighting, furniture, and architecture. The goal is to visually convey the mood of the location and immerse the viewer in its environment.

subitorato.title: Subitorato
subitorato.description: ‘Subitorato’ explores everyday perception and its effects on the individual by portraying an extreme state. The music plays with soundscapes and dissonance, especially using voices. It depicts how people become entangled in a reality shaped by their environment, gradually alienating themselves from their individuality. Only when they realize the emptiness of their routine are they overwhelmed by a sense of uncertainty that leads to panic.

meerdesLebens.title: The Sea of Life
meerdesLebens.description: This piece of music tells the story of a person who initially feels free but gradually gets caught in the swirl of life. A moment of curiosity — a mysterious discovery by the sea — opens a door to another world. What begins as an adventure becomes a reflection on losing oneself in the everyday, being swept along by the masses, and slowly forgetting one's own identity.

landscapePhotography.title: Landscape Photography
landscapePhotography.description: Environmental photography captures the mood and details of a location, whether in nature or urban spaces. It focuses on the interplay of light, shadow, and surroundings to visually draw the viewer into the scene.

mediaInfoGrafik2016.title: Infographic: Movie Trends 2016
mediaInfoGrafik2016.description: The infographic presents information on visitor numbers, market share, first releases, produced films, and the most popular movies across Austria's federal states in 2016.

nintendoMessestand.title: Nintendo Trade Show Booth
nintendoMessestand.description: A concept was developed for a fictional Nintendo trade show booth, including a meeting space, gaming area, and exhibition zone. The booth combines interactive experiences with a modern, functional design to immerse visitors in the world of Nintendo.

career.title: Career
career.claim: My Journey: Design, Code and Creativity
career.intro: With a passion for design and technology, I combine creative and technical expertise to develop innovative solutions. As a designer and developer, I create visual experiences that are both aesthetically appealing and functional. My projects range from classic print design and production, branding, and corporate design to UX/UI design and complex technical development, where I merge modern technologies with creative approaches. With a strong focus on user experience and usability, I optimize digital products and take them to the next level.

items.title: Frontend Developer, UI/UX Designer, Marketing & Design
items.description: Development of web applications and user interface design for various clients. Internal graphics and marketing work.

items.title: Front Desk & Service Staff
items.description: Customer service, event support in the karting hall.

items.description: Sales and service in bakery café.

items.title: Service & Hospitality Assistant
items.description: Service staff for events such as weddings and corporate parties.

items.company: INVENT Marketing and Tourism GmbH, Linz

items.title: Graphic Design, Internal Marketing Department
items.company: Roco Model Railways Holding GmbH, Bergheim

items.title: Vacation Cover, Graphic Design
items.description: Design and layout work for client projects.

items.company: Flöckner Bakery and Pastry, Salzburg Gnigl

items.title: Summer Assistant, Ice Cream Sales & Service

items.description: Live piano performances for dinner guests.
